韋利.definition: Waley or Whaley (name); Arthur Waley (1889-1966), pioneer British sinologist

韋德.definition: Wade (name); Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), sinologist 威妥瑪|威妥玛[Wei1 Tuo3 ma3]

韋慕庭.definition: Clarence Martin Wilbur (1908-1997), US Sinologist and Professor of Columbia University

韋應物.definition: Wei Yingwu (c. 737 - c. 792), Tang dynasty poet

韋格納.definition: Alfred Wegener (1880-1930), German meteorologist and geophysicist, the originator of the theory of continental drift; also written 魏格納|魏格纳

韋氏鶲鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Whistler's warbler (Phylloscopus whistleri)

韋編三絕.definition: lit. the leather binding (of the bamboo scroll) has broken three times; fig. to study diligently

韋達.definition: François Viète (1540-1603), French mathematician, father of modern algebraic notation

韋馱菩薩.definition: Skanda, the general or guardian Bodhisattva
